about_the_game:
Francis is a sassy millennial living her dream as an intern in the Golden Gate City. Her rent is high and her apartment is tiny, but nothing can upset her while her furry friend Chewbarka is by her side. When Francis accidentally leaves her bay window open one pawful night, Chewbarka disappears and her world is turned upside down.

Embark on a humorous adventure to help Francis find Chewbarka.
Along the way you will meet interesting characters like Chad and Brad the Techbros and the professionally successful Unicornman.
Francis will need to enlist the help of her neighbors by solving puzzles such as
  • Taking a yoga certification class to become an instructor
  • Completing the Neighborhood People's parade float in time for the Pride parade
  • Providing guidance for Burger Bill to pivot his failing food truck business

Sillyfun Valley has a simple point-and-click gameplay reminiscent of classic 2D adventures of the past.
A modern interface has been updated with "apps" that enables new functionality including:
  • Calling a rideshare to visit new locations (don't worry it's billed to her parents' credit card)
  • Requesting a romantic date with someone local in each neighborhood (romance not guaranteed)
  • Tracking the outstanding tasks on Francis's to-do list (and crossing off the completed ones)

Download for FREE now and join the party!

content_descriptors.notes:
The game is mostly customer friendly with no nudity, violence, or sexual activity.
There is an instance of marijuana use (which is legal in California).

detailed_description:
Francis is a sassy millennial living her dream as an intern in the Golden Gate City. Her rent is high and her apartment is tiny, but nothing can upset her while her furry friend Chewbarka is by her side. When Francis accidentally leaves her bay window open one pawful night, Chewbarka disappears and her world is turned upside down.

Embark on a humorous adventure to help Francis find Chewbarka.
Along the way you will meet interesting characters like Chad and Brad the Techbros and the professionally successful Unicornman.
Francis will need to enlist the help of her neighbors by solving puzzles such as
  • Taking a yoga certification class to become an instructor
  • Completing the Neighborhood People's parade float in time for the Pride parade
  • Providing guidance for Burger Bill to pivot his failing food truck business

Sillyfun Valley has a simple point-and-click gameplay reminiscent of classic 2D adventures of the past.
A modern interface has been updated with "apps" that enables new functionality including:
  • Calling a rideshare to visit new locations (don't worry it's billed to her parents' credit card)
  • Requesting a romantic date with someone local in each neighborhood (romance not guaranteed)
  • Tracking the outstanding tasks on Francis's to-do list (and crossing off the completed ones)

Download for FREE now and join the party!

  • Processor: Intel 2 GHz Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 400 MB available space

  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 400 MB available space

name: Sillyfun Valley

  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 400 MB available space

  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 400 MB available space

short_description: Francis's best friend and canine companion, Chewbarka, is missing! Join her on a hilarious animated (FREE) adventure as she searches the quirky neighborhoods of Sillyfun Valley to find her dear doggie. Along the way she will meet eccentric inhabitants, solves puzzles, and even find romance!
